Events that occurred on 22 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1813 - Composer Richard Wagner is born.
1980 - Actress Nazanin Boniadi is born.
1992 - The Tolkien Phenomenon begins in Turku, Finland.
2010 - "Tolkien and Philosophy" seminar in Modena, Italy.
2011 - Unquendor's Lustrumfeest.
2011 - The Tolkien Society's Middle-earth Weekend in Sarehole, Birmingham.
2014 - Beowulf: A Translation and Commentary is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
